data.author: Paul Bouillon

changelog.release_notes:
- Compatible with firmware 4.0 
- Fully compatible with Pebble 2 (Diorite platform) 
- Fixed a bug on Pebble Time Round 
- Now you can choose to show or hide the clock

- Compatible with firmware 4.0
- Fully compatible with Pebble 2 (Diorite platform)
- Fixed a bug on Pebble Time Round
- Now you can choose to show or hide the clock

Now compatible with Pebble Health ! 
Many improvements.
You need the firmware 3.9 (or more recent) to run this version of FitCat.

Now compatible with Pebble Health !
Removed Aplite support.
More ...
Minor optimisations of the UI.
Updated some colors in UI (Pebble Time).

Updated the main screen layout (Pebble Time).
Fixed the step counting sensitivity (Pebble Time Round).

Since update 2.1b: you need the firmware 3.6 to run FitCat on your color Pebble. Update directly from the Pebble Time app.
Fixed a bug about background images not showing properly.
Added Pebble Time Round support.

Fixed a bug.
Added a new animation (Pebble Time).
Improvements (Pebble Time).
Now you can buy animations (Pebble Time).

Added a new outdoor scene (Pebble Time).
Added a cat name.
Added two outdoor scenes (Pebble Time).
Added the configuration page.

Improved the step counting algorithm.
Added a "Decorations" category in the integrated store (Pebble Time).
Changed the behavior of the cat.

Reduced battery usage (Both platforms).
Added an outside scene (Pebble Time).
Other improvements.

Improved the mini-game on Pebble Time.
Updated with the last version of the SDK (3.0).

A lot of improvements for the Pebble Time version:
- step counting a lot more accurate
- improved clock readability (more contrast)
- changed some colors in the UI

Added scenes (Aplite).
Reduced memory usage (Aplite).
Improved the Hospital scene (Basalt).

data.description:
FitCat features both a virtual pet and an activity tracker in a single watchapp. 

Watch Gnocchi, your cat, live his own life on your wrist. What he does depends on what YOU do: if you are walking, he will be walking too. If you are chilling, he will be chilling too.
The more you move, the more virtual money you earn. Then you can use that money to interact with Gnocchi and make him happy.

FitCat is the funniest way to live an active life.

Features:
-	Different animations of the cat
-	Many environments with day and night variations
-	Integrated mini game
-	Fully compatible with Pebble Health
-	You can set your daily step goal and see your achievements
-	Timeline pins to inform you about your daily step goal

If you like FitCat, give it a heart ! <3

There is still a lot more to come ... 
To stay tuned, follow me on Twitter : @PaulKubGames
